text:
Actor-turned-BJP leader Shatrughan Sinha on Saturday supported JNUSU president Kanhaiya Kumar, praising the speech that he delivered after being released on bail. Mr. Sinha dubbed Mr. Kumar as a “son of Bihar.”

He said the student leader proved that he had potential. Earlier, Mr. Sinha had expressed happiness when Mr. Kumar was granted bail by the Delhi High Court. Unlike most BJP leaders, Mr. Sinha said there was nothing wrong if Kanhaiya demanded azadi (freedom) from poverty, casteism and hunger, besides his stand on freedom of expression under the rights provided by the Constitution. — IANS
title: Shatrughan Sinha praises JNU leader
